trans-unit.source: Our token cache should work in a simple case but, what happens when the token expires or is revoked?
trans-unit.target: Our token cache should work in a simple case but, what happens when the token expires or is revoked?

trans-unit.source: The token could expire when the app is not running.
trans-unit.target: The token could expire when the app is not running.

trans-unit.source: This would mean the token cache is invalid.
trans-unit.target: This would mean the token cache is invalid.

trans-unit.source: The token could also expire while the app is actually running during a call the app makes directly or a call made by the Mobile Services library.
trans-unit.target: The token could also expire while the app is actually running during a call the app makes directly or a call made by the Mobile Services library.

trans-unit.source: The result will be an HTTP status code 401 "Unauthorized".
trans-unit.target: The result will be an HTTP status code 401 "Unauthorized".

trans-unit.source: We need to be able to detect an expired token, and refresh it.
trans-unit.target: We need to be able to detect an expired token, and refresh it.

trans-unit.source: To do this we use a <linkText>ServiceFilter</linkText><title></title> from the <linkText>Android client library</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: To do this we use a <linkText>ServiceFilter</linkText><title></title> from the <linkText>Android client library</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: In this section you will define a ServiceFilter that will detect a HTTP status code 401 response and trigger a refresh of the token and the token cache.
trans-unit.target: In this section you will define a ServiceFilter that will detect a HTTP status code 401 response and trigger a refresh of the token and the token cache.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, this ServiceFilter will block other outbound requests during authentication so that those requests can use the refreshed token.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, this ServiceFilter will block other outbound requests during authentication so that those requests can use the refreshed token.

trans-unit.source: Open the ToDoActivity.java file and add the following import statements:
trans-unit.target: Open the ToDoActivity.java file and add the following import statements:

trans-unit.source: Add the following members to the ToDoActivity class.
trans-unit.target: Add the following members to the ToDoActivity class.

trans-unit.source: These will be used to help synchronize the authentication of the user.
trans-unit.target: These will be used to help synchronize the authentication of the user.

trans-unit.source: We only want to authenticate once.
trans-unit.target: We only want to authenticate once.

trans-unit.source: Any calls during an authentication should wait and use the new token from the authentication in progress.
trans-unit.target: Any calls during an authentication should wait and use the new token from the authentication in progress.

trans-unit.source: In the ToDoActivity.java file, add the following method to the ToDoActivity class that will be used to block outbound calls on other threads while authentication is in progress.
trans-unit.target: In the ToDoActivity.java file, add the following method to the ToDoActivity class that will be used to block outbound calls on other threads while authentication is in progress.

trans-unit.source: In the ToDoActivity.java file, add the following method to the ToDoActivity class.
trans-unit.target: In the ToDoActivity.java file, add the following method to the ToDoActivity class.

trans-unit.source: This method will actually trigger the wait and then update the token on outbound requests when authentication is complete.
trans-unit.target: This method will actually trigger the wait and then update the token on outbound requests when authentication is complete.

trans-unit.source: In the ToDoActivity.java file, update the authenticate method of the ToDoActivity class so that it accepts a boolean parameter to allow forcing the refresh of the token and token cache.
trans-unit.target: In the ToDoActivity.java file, update the authenticate method of the ToDoActivity class so that it accepts a boolean parameter to allow forcing the refresh of the token and token cache.

trans-unit.source: We also need to notify any blocked threads when authentication is completed so they can pick up the new token.
trans-unit.target: We also need to notify any blocked threads when authentication is completed so they can pick up the new token.

trans-unit.source: In the ToDoActivity.java file, add this code for a new RefreshTokenCacheFilter class inside the ToDoActivity class:
trans-unit.target: In the ToDoActivity.java file, add this code for a new RefreshTokenCacheFilter class inside the ToDoActivity class:

trans-unit.source: This service filter will check each response for HTTP status code 401 "Unauthorized".
trans-unit.target: This service filter will check each response for HTTP status code 401 "Unauthorized".

trans-unit.source: If a 401 is encountered, a new login request to obtain a new token will be setup on the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: If a 401 is encountered, a new login request to obtain a new token will be setup on the UI thread.

trans-unit.source: Other calls will be blocked until the login is completed, or until 5 attempts have failed.
trans-unit.target: Other calls will be blocked until the login is completed, or until 5 attempts have failed.

trans-unit.source: If the new token is obtained, the request that triggered the 401 will be retried with the new token and any blocked calls will be retried with the new token.
trans-unit.target: If the new token is obtained, the request that triggered the 401 will be retried with the new token and any blocked calls will be retried with the new token.

trans-unit.source: This filter will show the progress bar on the beginning of the request and will hide it when the response arrived.
trans-unit.target: This filter will show the progress bar on the beginning of the request and will hide it when the response arrived.

trans-unit.target: In this code, RefreshTokenCacheFilter is used in addition to ProgressFilter.

trans-unit.source: Also during onCreate we want to load the token cache.
trans-unit.target: Also during onCreate we want to load the token cache.

trans-unit.source: So false is passed in to the authenticate method.
trans-unit.target: So false is passed in to the authenticate method.
